1.title: A New Threat
1.plot: New rookies hit the line in New Mexico's prison system, where violence is at an all-time high and the notorious SNM gang has declared war on all COs.

2.title: Fear
2.plot: Young rookies must face their fears while working with violent convicts and gang members.

3.title: Predator vs Prey
3.plot: The rookies must find ways to assert their authority or risk being preyed upon by predatory inmates.

4.title: Survival of the Fittest
4.plot: Only the strong survive in prison, both inmate and officer alike. Purto and D'Angelo clash with antagonistic inmates.

5.title: Boiling Point
5.plot: Working in corrections tests patience and courage every day, and it's beginning to take a toll on the rookies. Mangin and Cordova must subdue a gang member after he threatens them. Israel refuses to follow prison protocol when a former SNM gang member intimidates him. Lilly gets a confidence boost when she discovers drugs in an inmate's mail, and Purto is called to a special assignment discharging a high-risk inmate.

6.title: Mind Games
6.plot: For rookies, the mental game in prison can be even more challenging than the physical one. D'Angelo is frustrated when he has trouble catching inmates in his unit with contraband.

7.title: No Room for Error
7.plot: Violence against New Mexico law enforcement is on the rise, and even the smallest mistake can become devastating. Mangin joins the extraction team and must forcibly remove an unwilling inmate from his cell. Israel makes an error when performing a drug test and Fabian loses track of inmates in his unit. Ariel starts a new post and goes too far to establish her authority, setting up a serious conflict.

8.title: Building the Case
8.plot: The department's case against the prison gangs is building and the rookies must learn to find evidence that will take them down for good. Purto redeems himself with STIU and assists in a major SNM drug bust. D'Angelo finally finds drugs in the open dormitory. Mangin and Cordova respond to an emergency involving an irate inmate. Fabian is discouraged and has to call his brother for help.

9.title: The Ones That Make It
9.plot: After a few months on the job, some rookies are finding their footing as officers while others are starting to fall behind. Lilly works control in an SNM pod that's been locked down after a recent murder. Chaz gets ready for an extraction, and new cadet Javier excels in the training academy. Fabian makes a major mistake that puts his job in jeopardy. Ariel begins to doubt her career choice, and stops showing up to work...

1.title: Is It Worth It?
1.plot: The minute a rookie corrections officer steps onto the tier for the first time, he or she becomes a target to some of the most hardened career criminals. This episode follows the best in class as they begin their careers at Penitentiary New Mexico. Whether they're cadets in training or brand new on the line, the officers all wrestle with a life-or-death question: Is it worth it?

2.title: Respect
2.plot: The minute a rookie corrections officer steps onto the tier for the first time, he or she becomes a target to some of the most hardened career criminals.

3.title: Gangland
3.plot: Gangs are the number one threat to maintaining order at PNM. Members are organized, loyal and often violent.

4.title: The Con Game
4.plot: Inmates are called convicts for good reason. Once inside, they have nothing but time to conjure up ingenious ways to hide contraband and manipulate COs. Mangin gets conned by a career criminal and Andrew helps STIU bust a drug dealing gang member. Ariel deals with the challenges of being a female CO.

5.title: The Riot
5.plot: Violence is a way of life in prison and the threat of it keeps both COs and inmates on constant alert. Zach investigates a fight while Keith deals with unstable and violent inmates. Ariel is a "rover" wrestling with the uncertainty that comes with the job. And PNM's tragic past, which includes the bloodiest prison riot in American history, acts as both a haunting reminder and a catalyst for change.

6.title: The Drug Trade
6.plot: Most of PNM's inmates are serving long-term sentences for violent crimes, and for many it's drugs that help them get through the time. Despite efforts to keep the prison clean, narcotics always find their way into this otherwise closed world. Francisco suspects an inmate is high while Andrew takes inmates on a high-risk work detail outside of the prison.

7.title: Sink or Swim
7.plot: With a few months on the line under their belts, the rookies are beginning to understand the harsh realities of their new careers. Keith is at a crossroads while Andrew tires to find the balance needed to be an effective officer. The training wheels come off for Zach as he faces new challenges without his mentor and a new CO takes his first post.

8.title: Breaking Point
8.plot: An inmate walks off a work detail; Ariel is assigned to PNM's worst inmates; Keith decides it's time for a change; Andrew and Mangin form a partnership; a former CO tries to get his job back.

-1.title: Rookie C.O with a Bad Personality/Attitude
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

locations: Penitentiary of New Mexico, Santa Fe County, New Mexico, USA
imdb.title: Behind Bars: Rookie Year
plot: Rookie correctional officers step foot into New Mexico prison and are taught to learn ways of handling criminals and their toughness.
